name: @paulbarmstrong/cdk-static-website-from-asset
author: Paul B. Armstrong
description: A CDK construct for hosting a static website based on an Asset, and an Asset construct extension to help with building apps from source files.

scripts.generate-docs: npx typedoc --readme none --entryDocument index.md --githubPages false --sourceLinkTemplate 'https://github.com/paulbarmstrong/cdk-static-website-from-asset/blob/main/{path}#L{line}' --excludeExternals --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs lib/index.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run generate-docs
